subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Teresa Earnhardt and Chip Ganassi will combine their sponsorship-strapped race teams next season in an effort to stabilize their organizations in a tough economic time.
snippet: Teresa Earnhardt and Chip Ganassi will combine their sponsorship-strapped race teams next season in an effort to stabilize their organizations in a tough economic time.
